Text.Page:
Barabok the Frostreaver has sworn to use the eldritch shards to rebuild the giants' empire.

Of course, we're certain he's insane but we want him dead nevertheless.

Hunt down {@LinkCreature:34#5002#Barabok} and end his delusions of grandeur.

Giants are no small foe. You handled Barabok well.

It's hard to imagine a race that once rivaled the gods could fall so far as stealing shards in the ice.
